00023 #include <Kernel.hpp>
00024 #include <Atom.hpp>
00025 
00026 namespace loos {
00027 
00028   Kernel::~Kernel() {
00029     std::vector<internal::Action*>::iterator i;
00030     for (i = actions.begin(); i != actions.end(); i++)
00031       delete (*i);
00032   }
00033   
00034   void Kernel::push(internal::Action *act) {
00035     act->setStack(&val_stack);
00036     actions.push_back(act); 
00037   }
00038   
00039   void Kernel::pop(void) { actions.pop_back(); }
00040   
00041   void Kernel::execute(pAtom pa) {
00042 
00043     std::vector<internal::Action*>::iterator i;
00044     for (i=actions.begin(); i != actions.end(); i++) {
00045       (*i)->setAtom(pa);
00046       (*i)->execute();
00047     }
00048   }
00049 
00050     
00051   void Kernel::clearActions(void) { actions.clear(); }
00052 
00053   internal::ValueStack& Kernel::stack(void) { return(val_stack); }
00054 
00055   std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Kernel& k) {
00056     std::vector<internal::Action*>::const_iterator i;
00057 
00058     os << "Commands:\n";
00059     for (i=k.actions.begin(); i != k.actions.end(); i++)
00060       os << (*i)->name() << std::endl;
00061     os << std::endl;
00062     return(os);
00063   }
00064   
00065 }
